title: Client lag
body: My client is lagging like crazy, in game i'm fine the whole computer is fine, its just the client pre lobby and champ select have tried repairing any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
Just want to comment on this as I'm experiencing the same issue:

Why should we have to change the compatibility mode and UAC to run the client as an administrator, even though the issue did not exist until RiotClientServices was set up? 

Setting to just "Run as Admin" resolves the issue, but why does the application require administrative rights all of a sudden for smooth operation?
